info.title: REST API for the EK80 Echo Sounder
info.description:
This API is for internal Simrad/Kongsberg Maritime use only.

The API, and the documentation of it, is currently under construction and is subject to change without further notice

get.summary: Get current state of the application
Get current state of the application
Get current operation mode

put.summary: Set current operation mode

get.summary: Get current play state

put.summary: Set current play state

get.summary: Get current ping mode

put.summary: Set current ping mode

get.summary: Get current ping interval (when ping-mode is set to interval)

put.summary: Set current ping interval

get.summary: Get current synchronization mode

put.summary: Set current synchronization mode

get.summary: Get current synchronization delay

put.summary: Set current synchronization delay

get.summary: Get current external sync settings

put.summary: Set current external sync settings

get.summary: Get current user setting

put.summary: Set current user setting

get.summary: Get details about the application
Get Drop keel offset

put.summary: Set Drop keel offset

parameters.name: dropkeelSettings
parameters.description: The new offset value and IsManual flag. New value only takes effect if IsManual is true

get.summary: Get water level offset

put.summary: Set water level offset

parameters.name: waterLevelSettings
parameters.description: The new water level offset value and IsManual flag. New value only takes effect if IsManual is true

get.summary: Get manual speed settings

put.summary: Set manual speed setting

parameters.name: speedSettings
parameters.description: The new vessel speed value and IsManual flag. New value only takes effect if IsManual is true

get.summary: Get a list of all manual settings
Get a list of all installed transducers

put.summary: Sets a new intallation for a given transducer

parameters.name: transducerId
parameters.description: Custom Name of the transducer to be updated

parameters.name: installation
parameters.description: The new installation struct for the specified transducer

get.summary: Get environmental data for the water column

put.summary: set environmental data for the water column

get.summary: Get environmental data for the transducer face

post.summary: Set environmental data for the transducer face

get.summary: Get list of all installed sensors
Get list of all sensor types that can be installed.
Get list of all sensors that are installed.

parameters.name: sensorDef
parameters.description: A ConfiguredSensorDefinition that the defines the sensor to add.

parameters.name: customName
parameters.description: Custom name of the sensor to delete.

get.summary: Get Processed data storage enabled flag

put.summary: Turn on or off storage of processed data

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: The Processed data storage enabled flag (On/Off)

get.summary: Get all adcp processing parameters for specific channel

put.summary: Set error velocity limit
Activate or deactivate error velocity limit
Set correlation percentage limit
Activate or deactivate correlation percentage limit
Set minimum quality average data factor

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The new minimum quality average data factor

put.summary: Activate or deactivate minimum quality average data factor
Set minimum limit for Sv

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The new minimum limit for Sv in dB

put.summary: Activate or deactivate test on minimum limit for Sv
Set maximum limit for Sv

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The new maximum limit for Sv in dB

put.summary: Activate or deactivate test on maximum limit for Sv
Switch between PC time or epoch time from transceiver

get.summary: Check if bottom detection is on and off

put.summary: Turn on and off bottom detection
Set range from where bottom detector should start searching for bottom
Set range from where bottom detector should stop searching for bottom
Set the bottom backstep value for bottom detection

get.summary: Get pulse settings for a given channel

put.summary: Set pulse settings for a given channel

parameters.name: pulseSettings
parameters.description: A struct giving a set of pulse setting. The struct contains: pulse-type (string)[CW, LFM, LFMD], pulse-duration (double, [s], depending on frequency and pulse-type), start-frequency ([Hz]), end-frequency ( [Hz]),  channel-mode(Active, Passive, test), Ramping (Fast/Slow), filter-type (string) .

get.summary: Get transmit power for a given channel

put.summary: Set transmit power for a given channel

get.summary: Get adcp ping configuration

put.summary: Set adcp ping configuration

get.summary: Get MainStorageSettings struct with the most common storage settings
Get range settings for a specific channel

put.summary: Sets the range settings for a specific channel

parameters.name: channel_range
parameters.description: IndividualRangeControl struct with rabge settings for a channel

get.summary: Is recording raw files on or off

put.summary: Turns on or off raw data storage

parameters.name: recordRawActive
parameters.description: A bool value if raw data storage should be turned on or off

get.summary: Get Advanced Sequencing complete configuration

put.summary: Set Advanced Sequencing complete configuration

parameters.name: sequencingSetting
parameters.description: A struct giving a set of sequences. The struct contains:  A list of sequences (name, ensembles added)

get.summary: Get information about all installed transceivers
Get information about a specific installed transceiver
Get information about a specific installed transceiver

AvailableSensor.description: Definition of a sensor that is defined for the product and can be installed

ConfiguredSensorDefinition.description: Definition of a sensor that is defined for the product and can be installed

PulseSettings.description: Struct to set pulse settings as a consistent set.

AdvancedSequencingSettings.description: Struct to set advanced sequencing as a consistent set.
